AFC 700OA

Fully automated control panel with Siemens monochrome touch screen and PLC, with a telephone modem and/or Ethernet card that is incorporated into the control box so that AFC can offer remote assistance and troubleshooting. This control panel is controlling 7 spray booths. It is monitoring the pressure inside of each booth, and as the pressure starts to increase because of dirty filters, it will increase the speed of the exhaust fans to help compensate for dirty filters. Once the exhaust fan can no longer keep up with the static pressure it will notify the user with a warning screen via the touch screen. In addition to this it also monitors each booths usage, and if any of the booths are running with no production inside it will slow the fan speeds down to 20% of its normal operating speed, thus hibernating the booth. Once production starts inside of that booth it will return back to full speed.
